sections.intro: Feel the raw power of Raavana Mavan Daa, a high-octane track composed by Anirudh Ravichander for the movie Vettaiyan. This song perfectly captures a 'mass' persona with its thumping beats and aggressive lyrical flow. Dive into the deep meanings behind these fierce Tamil verses.
sections.easterEgg:
Hidden Details You Missed! ЁЯХ╡я╕ПтАНтЩВя╕П

  • The 'Ravana' imagery is a recurring motif in director T.J. GnanavelтАЩs character building for the protagonist, symbolizing a complex hero with grey shades.
  • Anirudh uses a heavy 'Tribal Bass' influence in the percussion to denote the raw, unbridled power of the character portrayed by Rajinikanth.
  • The lyric 'Othayil nikkira yeman' (The lone God of Death) refers to the climax sequence where the hero faces the odds entirely by himself.
sections.faq:
Frequently Asked Questions

What is the significance of 'Ravana mavan'?

It translates to 'Son of Ravana,' used metaphorically to describe someone with immense power, ego, and defiance against traditional norms.

Who wrote the lyrics for Raavana Mavan Daa?

The lyrics were penned by Super Subu, known for his high-energy and 'mass' appeal verses in Anirudh's compositions.

englishStanzas:
Ravana mavan da
Othayil nikkira yeman da
Athana pimbamum avan da
Ulagaandavan da

[He is the son of Ravana, the God of Death standing alone. Every reflection is him; he is the one who ruled the world.]

Vaa vandhu thodudaa
Kuthiru rathamum varunda
Kuthura kombanum evan da
Oli pondravan da

[Come and try to touch him! The chariot of spears is arriving. Who is the mighty one to strike him? He is like the light.]

Sarinjudhaan nadakkuraa
Nalamellaam murukkalaa yerum
Unakkuthaan thalaividhi
Adichadhum kirukkalaa maarum

[He walks with a slight lean, and his strength rises with pride. Your destiny is in his hands; once he strikes, it all becomes a blur.]

Por gunam irukka
Sigaram kandavan serukka
Avana seendura kirukka
Mogam veengirukka

[With a warrior's spirit and the pride of one who reached the peakтАФhey you madman trying to provoke him, is your ego swollen?]

Naayaga neruppaa
Thottavan kaiyila karuppaa
Yaarunnu kandadhum poruppaa
Asayaadhiruppaan

[The hero is like fire; whoever touches him gets burnt (charred). Once they realize who he is, they stay still out of respect and responsibility.]

Vasanamaa ezhudhalaa
Avan dhaan adhukkellaam mela
Edhiriyaa anuppunaa
Sirikkiraan pazhagittaan pola

[He isn't defined by written dialogues; he is above all that. If you send an enemy, he just laughsтАФit seems heтАЩs quite used to it.]
